author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Dollar Declines After Bigger-Than-Expected Inflation Gains
text:
The U.S. dollar fell along with government bond prices after a report showed U.S. consumer prices rose at a faster-than-expected pace.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which tracks the currency against a basket of 16 others, fell 0.4% to 83.37.
